pr_title: Fix SYS COLUMNS schema in ODBC mode

timeline.message:
Fix SYS COLUMNS schema in ODBC mode

This fixes a regression when certain ODBC-specific columns that need to
be of the short type were returned as the integer type.

timeline.bodyText: Personal preference: I like to have the private methods at the bottom of the class and not before they are first used.
timeline.author: matriv

replies.bodyText:

timeline.message:
Fix results pagination

A ListCursor needs to be providing the Page, otherwise the pagination is
not respected.

Also fix review comments.

Fix test stubbing. Add cursor test

This fixes the stubbing for the *-indices SYS COLUMN commands.

It also adds testing for response pagination in ODBC mode.

Fix style violation

Trim a line to 140 border.
